新研究定义了感染后 ME/CFS 的临床表型，强调了独特的生物标志物见解PI肌痛性脑炎/慢性疲劳综合征（ME/CFS）的病理生理机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/New-study-defines-clinical-phenotype-of-Post-infectious-MECFS-highlighting-unique-biomarker-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/New-study-defines-clinical-phenotype-of-Post-infectious-MECFS-highlighting-unique-biomarker-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df72db3a-387d-4e12-ac80-2a1df0b792f8 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:06:00 -0500 New study defines clinical phenotype of Post-infectious ME/CFS, highlighting unique biomarker insights

现成的癌症疫苗在 KRAS 突变肿瘤患者中显示出有希望的结果74 岁的萨马拉·拉赫曼 (Samara Rahman) 认为自己很幸运。她可以在海滩上散步、游泳、骑自行车； 2022 年 11 月，当她被诊断出患有胰腺癌时，她身上的所有东西都被夺走了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Off-the-shelf-cancer-vaccine-shows-promising-results-in-病人-with-KRAS-mutated-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Off-the-shelf-cancer-vaccine-shows-promising-results-in-病人-with-KRAS-mutated-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f312172-40ec-4eb1-bbbf-980a24c893de Thu, 22 Feb 2024 23:48:00 -0500 Off-the-shelf cancer vaccine shows promising results in patients with KRAS-mutated tumors
耶鲁大学化学家从海洋无脊椎动物中合成复杂的抗癌分子大约 30 年前，科学家在苔藓虫家族中发现了一类独特的抗癌分子，苔藓虫是热带水域中发现的海洋无脊椎动物门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Yale-chemists-synthesize-complex-anticancer-molecules-from-marine-invertebrates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Yale-chemists-synthesize-complex-anticancer-molecules-from-marine-invertebrates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5d430ac-9182-41ba-9143-af9db86da8e2 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 23:41:00 -0500 Yale chemists synthesize complex anticancer molecules from marine invertebrates
